name: Zoop
overview: Right here inside this little cardboard box is the excitement you crave, the challenge you need. Level after level of brain-burning action coming at you from all sides, faster and faster until your thumbs are numb, your eyes are aching and your mind is molten. 99 levels of intense, non-stop action shatter the calmest of nerves! Breakthrough "Opti-Challenge" backgrounds increase the complexity of advancing levels... don't let your eyes deceive you. Intensifying gameplay demands expert strategic thinking. (In other words, use your head!)
